dcterms:description: A diagnostic dataset for compositional language and elementary visual reasoning, featuring unbiased, highly compositional questions that require an array of challenging reasoning skills.
dcterms:title: CLEVR

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of natural language questions collected through crowdsourcing, featuring a diverse vocabulary and linguistic variations that demand varied reasoning skills.
